examples.description: Create POST /api/auth/register endpoint that accepts email and password, validates input, hashes password, stores user in database, and returns JWT token
acceptance_criteria: Appropriate error responses for validation failures

examples.description: Set up initial database schema with users, sessions, and audit_logs tables. Configure migrations and seed data for development
acceptance_criteria: Users table with id, email, password_hash, created_at
Sessions table for JWT token management
Migration scripts work on fresh database

examples.description: Create responsive login page with email/password form, validation, loading states, and error handling. Integrate with auth API
acceptance_criteria: Form with email and password fields
Error messages displayed for failed login
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

examples.description: Configure Jest and React Testing Library for frontend tests, and pytest for backend. Create test utilities and sample tests
acceptance_criteria: Jest configured with proper babel settings
Sample unit test for one component
Sample integration test for one API endpoint

examples.description: Implement GET, POST, PUT, DELETE endpoints for user management with proper authorization and validation
acceptance_criteria: PUT /api/users/:id - update user (own profile or admin)

examples.description: Create Dockerfile for application, docker-compose for local development with database, and document setup process
acceptance_criteria: docker-compose.yml includes app and database services

notes.description_detail: Descriptions should specify what, why, and how
notes.acceptance_criteria: Should be testable and specific, not vague
